front.title: LDAPv3bis Suggestions: Summary of the X.500(96) User Schema for use with LDAPv3

abstract.t: This document provides an overview of the attribute types and objectclasses defined by the ISO and ITU-T committees in the X.500documents, in particular those intended for use by directory clients.This is the most widely used schema for LDAP/X.500 directories, andmany other schema definitions for white pages objects use it as abasis. This document does not cover attributes used for theadministration of X.500 directory servers, nor does it includeattributes defined by other ISO/ITU-T documents.
